infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Stylit does not track you across apps or websites.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Stylit accesses your photos to upload a face selfie for skin tone analysis (to determine your best clothing colors like 'Warm Spring' or 'Cool Winter') and a full-body photo (to calculate your measurements for accurate size recommendations).
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Stylit uses your camera to take a selfie for skin tone color analysis and to photograph clothing items. For example, you can snap a photo of a dress in a store to check if the color complements your skin tone.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Stylit saves virtual try-on images to your photo library. For example, after trying on an outfit virtually, you can save the result to share with friends for their opinion.
